section.heading: Right of director or committee member to information.
section.text: A director or a member of a committee appointed under § 29-1008.17 may obtain, inspect, and copy all information regarding the state of activities and financial condition of the limited cooperative association and other information regarding the activities of the association if the information is reasonably related to the performance of the director’s duties as director or the committee member’s duties as a member of the committee. Information obtained in accordance with this section shall not be used in any manner that would violate any duty of or to the association.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 821 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act. Edition
